column4: Communicate with LXMF-compatible systems over Reticulum networks using LoRa, Packet Radio, Wi-Fi, I2P, Encrypted QR Paper Messages https://reticulum.network/ https://github.com/markqvist/reticulum
Sideband uses the peer-to-peer and distributed messaging system LXMF https://github.com/markqvist/lxmf
